description.original: This is a Quran Lookup plugin for Obsidian. This replaces chapter:verse shorthand with verse text in arabic and translation.
description.translation: 这是 Obsidian 的《古兰经》查询插件。它会将章节:节号的简写替换为阿拉伯文的经文文本和译文。

dict..setDesc(\"If true, provides translation: .setDesc("如果启用，在阿拉伯文经文下方提供译文")
dict..setDesc(\"If true, removes the added tr: .setDesc("如果启用，移除通常出现在括号中的译者添加内容")
dict..setDesc(\"Wraps the Arabic verse in HTM: .setDesc("用 HTML Span CSS、反引号或无来包裹阿拉伯文经文")
dict..setDesc(\"Select the font family for th: .setDesc("选择《古兰经》文本的字体系列。")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the font size for the Qur: .setDesc("设置《古兰经》文本的字体大小。")
